column4: When i use compiz to flip through my desktops - I only have 2.  How can I add additional desktops?
right click on the workspace switcher->properties
preferences rather
so hsize 4 and vsize 1 is the cube
you could change it via gconf, or compizconfig-settings manager i suppose
I'll check the settings.
where exactly is it at in the compiz settings.. do u remember?  dont worry about it if u dont remember off the top of ur head.
should be in /apps/compiz/screen0
you'll want to change hsize and vsize, that's in gconf-editor btw...not in compiz settings
change them to what?
i can't recall exactly where in compizconfig now
hsize is the number of columns basically, and vsize the number of rows
in your workspace switcher
I see what you're taking about.  I changed that with workspace switcher.
cool
what's the setting for adding 2 additional desktops, though?
increasing hsize by 2 should work
bump. I just tried it here, worked for me
no need to restart x...hmm
compizconfig-settings-manager
i'm not sure where the settings are in there, maybe someone else remember?
